cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. 
[+1]: Create a 1/1 red Cat creature token with “When this creature dies, draw a card.”
[0]: You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, create a tapped token that's a copy of it, except the token is 1/1 and has decayed. [i](It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
[-2]: Return target creature or planeswalker card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Ai deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. You gain 1 life.[/i]
cards.special_text:
Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. 
[+1]: Create a 1/1 red Cat creature token with “When this creature dies, draw a card.”
[0]: You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, create a tapped token that's a copy of it, except the token is 1/1 and has decayed. [i](It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
[-2]: Return target creature or planeswalker card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.rules_text:
Deathtouch, protection from legendary
When this creature enters, you may exile a creature card and a planeswalker card from your graveyard. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it has the abilities and starting loyalty of that planeswalker.

When this artifact enters, exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
When this artifact leaves the battlefield, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying and vigilance.
